docs.title: /accounts
docs.text: This API is used to verify email.

docs.title: POST /password
docs.text:
This API is used to forgot password.

body:

{
    "email": "youremail@gmail.com"
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Password reset code sent successfully"
}

docs.title: PUT /password
docs.text:
This API is used to reset password.

body:

{
  "email": "youremail@gmail.com",
  "resetCode": "urResetCode",
  "newPassword": "urNewPassword",
  "confirmPassword": "confirmUrNewPassword"
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Password successfully reset"
}

docs.title: POST /register
docs.text:
body:

{
    "username": "urUsername",
    "fullName": "Your Full Name",
    "email": "youremail@gmail.com",
    "password": "urPassword",
    "confirmPassword": "urPassword"
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Verification code has been sent to email"
}

docs.title: POST /photo
docs.text:
This API is used to upload profile picture.

header:

{
    "Authorization": "Bearer urAccessToken",
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data"
}

body:

{
    "profilePhoto": "urPhotoFile"
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Profile photo uploaded successfully",
    "url": "urProfilePhotoUrl",
}

docs.title: PUT /photo
docs.text:
This API is used to update profile picture.

header:

{
    "Authorization": "Bearer urAccessToken",
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data"
}

body:

{
    "profilePhoto": "urPhotoFile"
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Profile photo updated successfully",
    "url": "urProfilePhotoUrl",
}

docs.title: GET /histories
docs.text:
header:

{
    "Authorization": "Bearer urAccessToken"
}

response

{
    "status": "success",
    "data": [
        {
            "snackName": "Chips",
            "nutritions": {
                "fat": 24,
                "saturated_fat": 2,
                "carbohydrates": 40,
                "sugars": 12,
                "fiber": 0,
                "protein": 8,
                "sodium": 0.2
            },
            "health_status": "Healthy",
            "recommendation": "Good to consume in moderate amounts",
            "createdAt": "2024-11-26T09:47:53.299Z"
        },
        {
            "snackName": "Chips 1",
            "nutritions": {
                "fat": 34,
                "saturated_fat": 2,
                "carbohydrates": 150,
                "sugars": 32,
                "fiber": 0,

            },

            "recommendation": "Good to consume 1 time per day",
            "createdAt": "2024-11-29T12:58:48.181Z"
        }
    ]
}

docs.title: GET /histories/{{snackName}}
docs.text:
This API is used to get history by snack name.

docs.title: POST /predicts
docs.text:
header:

{
    "Authorization": "Bearer urAccessToken"
}

body:

{
  "snackName": "Chips 1",
  "nutritions": {
    "fat": 34,
    "saturated_fat": 2,
    "carbohydrates": 150,
    "sugars": 32,
    "fiber": 0,
    "protein": 8,
    "sodium": 1.5
  }
}

response:

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Snack successfully predicted",
    "result": {
        "snackName": "Chips 1",
        "nutritions": {
            "fat": 34,
            "saturated_fat": 2,
            "carbohydrates": 150,
            "sugars": 32,
            "fiber": 0,
            "protein": 8,
            "sodium": 1.5
        },
        "health_status": "health status result",
        "recommendation": "recommendation result"
    }
}
